code: import{getPhotos,getPhoto,getPostPhotos}from"../util/photo_api_util";export var RECEIVE_PHOTOS="RECEIVE_PHOTOS";export var RECEIVE_PHOTO="RECEIVE_PHOTO";export var RECEIVE_POST_PHOTOS="RECEIVE_POST_PHOTOS";export var DELETE_PHOTO="DELETE_PHOTO";export var receivePhotos=function receivePhotos(photos){return{type:RECEIVE_PHOTOS,photos:photos};};export var receivePostPhotos=function receivePostPhotos(photos){return{type:RECEIVE_POST_PHOTOS,photos:photos};};export var receivePhoto=function receivePhoto(photo){return{type:RECEIVE_PHOTO,photo:photo};};export var fetchPhotos=function fetchPhotos(){return function(dispatch){return getPhotos().then(function(photos){return dispatch(receivePhotos(photos));}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};};export var fetchPhoto=function fetchPhoto(id){return function(dispatch){return getPhoto(id).then(function(photo){return dispatch(receivePhoto(photo));});};};export var fetchPostPhotos=function fetchPostPhotos(id){return function(dispatch){return getPostPhotos(id).then(function(photos){return dispatch(receivePostPhotos(photos));}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};};
